XII.i.2.A.1.
i
.
Evidence to Support a Claim for DIC
Evidence to support a claim for DIC may be obtained from
the claims folder
corporate record
VA medical center treatment reports or VA outpatient clinic records
STRs, or
private doctor or hospital treatment records.
Important
:  If the rating activity can grant DIC, and there is sufficient evidence in the Veteran’s corporate record, then the claims folder is not needed for review.
